name: Ballistic Football
description:
Ballistic Football

This game was made for the BTP3 Game Jam in just a week! The theme of the jam was less is more, I met the theme of this jam by making the whole game in just 30 secs. All code, art, music, sound, was made by me!

Description

Try to kill all your foes in just 30 seconds using your time manipulation powers and your football!

Controls
  • R to reset run
  • Esc to quit the game (Doesn't work on web version!)
  • Space to slow time
  • LMB to move
